    • startLogic

      public void startLogic(int timePerSide, int incrementPerMove, GameLogicController.GameType gameType)
      Start game of given type and setups the timers
      Parameters:
      timePerSide - timer for each player
      incrementPerMove - time added to player's timer every move
      gameType - game type (none, single, multi, analyze)
